0.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
0.Negative_Review: Really nothing negative to say about this hotel
0.Positive_Review: Very comfortable beds smart bathroom good shower Lovely facilities garden an absolute delight friendly staff quiet location

1.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
1.Negative_Review: No coffee or tea in the room or lobby No one to help with our bags from Tax into the Hotel No handicapped access At 80 years old it was very difficult for me to lug two large suit cases up the 12 oursidestairs and then up into the lobby

2.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
2.Negative_Review: Room was pretty small for the three of us
2.Positive_Review: The staff was very friendly and helpful in organizing our daytime activities Hotel located in a quiet area but very close to subway and restaurants

3.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
3.Positive_Review: We stayed at the hotel at a friend s recommendation It has great access to public transport and plenty of shops and places to eat close by Laundrette around the corner is also a bonus for long term travellers who need to freshen things up having access to the back garden was an added bonus for lovely summer evenings Would definitely stay there again

4.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
4.Negative_Review: Only cab service to airport is expensive compared to others 48 pounds plus tip
4.Positive_Review: Super location on Division underground line direct to Heathrow and central London Older facility but very accommodating staff Good breakfast many restaurant stores 1 2 block away Bathroom was tiny with no fan or ventilation so it got warmish Quite comfy but small rooms Beautiful garden in back Overall a great value for London Would stay here again

5.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
5.Negative_Review: London hotel rooms are very small There was very little storage Would have liked to have some drawers however small for storage
5.Positive_Review: Breakfast buffet was more than satisfactory Plenty of choices for all Bed was very comfortable Bathroom shower was powerful and plenty of hot water Location could not have been better Very short walk to underground Beautiful gardens at the rear of hotel Very quiet in spite of being close to Earl s Court Rd Staff was friendly and helpful Everyone was very easy to deal with

6.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
6.Negative_Review: The room for three people was on the small side
6.Positive_Review: There was a beautiful garden at the back of the property where guests could relax in the sunshine read order a drink etc A great location very close to Earls Court restaurants and tube Good breakfast

7.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
7.Negative_Review: Room wasn t ready on arrival after travelling from Leeds to London and phoning 2hours away to reserve parking Rude receptionist to girlfriend about parking as it wasn t our fault someone had taken our space We arrived at 16 00 and our room wasn t ready so was given a complimentary drink each and half an hour later still wasn t ready and being told it would be a further 40minutes Just wasn t good enough as we were only staying for 1 night and had a concert to go to
7.Positive_Review: Fantastic location very clean room someone called Leanne I think on reception was helpful and kind Breakfast was lovely great choice

8.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
8.Negative_Review: Our room allocated wasn t up to our expectations bathroom was to small when you opened bathroom door you banged into the toilet We had to require a different room at an extra cost of 30 a night
8.Positive_Review: Breakfast was excellent Staff in the restaurant were very pleasant especially the lady who took our room numbers showed us to our table

9.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
9.Negative_Review: The cooked elements of breakfast could have been better but the continental selection was very good
9.Positive_Review: The garden was a bonus Lovely area to have some quiet time and enjoy a drink Secure parking was also a good feature

10.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
10.Negative_Review: The room was a lot smaller than advertised I requested a room on the top floor was originally put on the 2nd floor They changed me to a room on the top floor only to find out at 1am that the room had previous electrical issues that they knew about which hadn t been resolved and caused a loud knocking noise Once reported to the front desk I was asked to move rooms at 1am No assistance was offered Second room was slightly larger than the first but not by much I thought the breakfast was a good quality but pretty overpriced Beds were rather stiff but not entirely uncomfortable I didn t find the staff very friendly They weren t mean they just didn t seem very keen on being pleasant bad day maybe The gym is not worth calling a gym Has some meager cardio equipment no real ventilation no tv
10.Positive_Review: Great location it s easy to find and incredibly close to the Earl s Court Underground station Clean Quiet Breakfast was a good quality and selection Nice pillows Lovely large windows in the rooms with beautiful billowing curtains Newly remodeled marble slate bathroom Mini fridge in room Desk had a mirror so it doubled as a great place to do hair and make up Beautiful garden area I didn t get to spend much time out back but it s worth buying a glass of wine and hanging out with some friends in that area

11.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
11.Negative_Review: Lower ground floor room L01 possibly the smallest bathroom I ve ever stayed in awful View from Windows not inspiring to see the rat traps outside Won t go back
11.Positive_Review: Location first and foremost Lovely gardens

12.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
12.Negative_Review: Dimensions of the room small But I m was a single room and Erls court London The space cost money as a traditional London hotel
12.Positive_Review: Very good hotel professional people s and very well organized Unfortunately the fitness area is veeery small maybe this hotel with this kind of level can evaluate in the best future to invest something more in space for this area Sauna was not available but o k i can accept this in summer period i hope this will not hapen during winter nothing more check always the price sometimes without promotion is not acceptable for this kind of structure I will pay for this not more than 150 p more than this price became not anymore competitive with similar hotel with same level

13.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
13.Negative_Review: Squeaky floors Difficult to go to the bathroom at night without waking my husband Also 4th floor our window didn t open to the outside
13.Positive_Review: Clean comfy beds Beautiful gardens Excellent helpful staff

14.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
14.Positive_Review: The staff were all so professional and friendly They really made the entire visit special and went out of their way to accommodate every inquiry or request we made The hotel itself was clean and the location to get on the Earl s Court tube was really convenient for all of our planned excursions I would totally recommend the K K Hotel George

15.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
15.Negative_Review: Not once during our four day stay including when we arrived to check in did any staff member speak to us before being spoken to first We were the only guests in the reception area when we checked in Not one single welcome good morning or hello in four days And we were not disgruntled or asking for any special requirements It was a very nice property but that indifferent attitude was a striking difference from every other small hotel and B B in which we stayed on this three week UK vacation We would not recommend K K Hotel George nor would we return ourselves
15.Positive_Review: Small but modern and well furnished room Nice linens and a superior small bathroom

16.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
16.Negative_Review: The hotel only support to call their contracted taxi which is expensive and unsafe when we paid by credit card they have no cashier mashine in the car instead they called the back office we had to tell them our credit card no expire month and the security no through the mobile phone this is very riskful for us The hotel should improve their taxi service raise the safety requirement to their contracted taxi company
16.Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed with two kind of pillows one higher and one lower that suit different need in our family The hotel has a inside garden beautiful English style where you feel relax with a glass of beer It s very close to the Earl s court station but still loated on a quite street you can keep the window open while you sleep during the night We like this hotel

17.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
17.Negative_Review: The front desk staff was not very informed regarding city happenings or tips Fortunately I could rely on the internet to answer more specific questions Additionally I was not entirely confident that they understood the questions I was asking in English
17.Positive_Review: Fantastic breakfast buffet Great location Quiet rooms

18.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
18.Positive_Review: We stay at this hotel each time we are in London in a nice quiet street just a short walk to Earls Court underground station the staff are always friendly rooms are always cleaned properly it s just a nice place to return to after a long day in London Great buffet breakfast

19.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
19.Positive_Review: Great position lovely having breakfast overlooking beautiful garden Which you could have a walk around or seat and relax Staff were very helpful and friendly

20.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
20.Negative_Review: Staff not very friendly Did their job but seldom smiled or made one feel welcomed
20.Positive_Review: Location near the Earl s Court Underground VERY convenient Restaurants nearby Good location away from the tourist bustle but very easy to get around London via the Tube

21.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
21.Negative_Review: Room size too small and it was too hot Our window was too small and It good lighting We stayed on the 4th floor and I believ that room should not be used but perhaps converted to a larger room or storage since the lighting was poor from this awkward size window Breakfast was ok but they started taking things away and cleaning while we were still there

22.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
22.Negative_Review: The room was a little stuffy They didn t have AC on yet Probably too early in the season Shower sometimes went hot and then cold
22.Positive_Review: Hotel was nice and comfortable Very clean Room was a bit small but adequate Staff was friendly and helpful The location was great because it was a 4 minute walk from 2 underground lines Plenty of restaurants convenience stores and ATM nearby

23.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
23.Negative_Review: The shower temperature was changing all the time from freezing to boiling and back
23.Positive_Review: We really liked the breakfast There was a wide choice of food The hotel is in a nice neighbourhood with many good quality restaurants It is also close to the subway station

24.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
24.Positive_Review: Room as advertised excellent location a 2 minute walk to buses and the tube Friendly and helpful front desk staff Would love to stay here on our next London trip too

25.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
25.Negative_Review: choice of food in bar wasn t too good but there are lots of great places to eat nearby so there was no problem
25.Positive_Review: quiet comfy room Very helpful staff Excellent location just off the Earls Court tube and lots of excellent places to eat close by

26.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
26.Negative_Review: The fact the windows don t open and the room was hot and stuffy and the bed was hard it was necessary to switch heating off put aircon on maximum and then of course it was noisy and even so there was no fresh air which is essential
26.Positive_Review: Closeness to Piccadilly Line and general ambience of the hotel

27.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
27.Negative_Review: The rooms are very small we had trouble fitting 2 suitcases in The price is fairly high even by London s standards and breakfast was extra
27.Positive_Review: The location is excellent direct route from the airport at Heathrow The hotel is clean and modern and has basic amenities breakfast room bar The street is quiet A good hotel if travelling on business

28.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
28.Negative_Review: The room is a little small and the decor is dated
28.Positive_Review: The staff were superb very helpful and friendly The hotel is in an excellent position close to the Underground station and easy to get to The room was very clean and well serviced each day

29.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
29.Negative_Review: Air con seemed to be set on winter warmer but easily resolved switched it off and opened window simples
29.Positive_Review: The location was excellent 2 mins from tube and walkable to several locations Kensington Palace Albert Hall Knightsbridge etc if you re reasonably mobile We received a complimentary upgrade on the room Bed was lovely and comfortable Hotel was lovely Staff friendly and attentive As is just off main road nice and quiet Can t review facilities as we spent all day and night out in the city but what we saw and read it had all you need I always judge things on whether you d return and in this case yes I would You ll probably be able to get cheaper elsewhere but when you walk in you will realise why Lovely hotel for a special occasion

30.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
30.Negative_Review: We needed gluten free breakfast and ordered it beforehand but the serving was not safe The toasts were but nothing else not The table was set up in the way that cross contamination was difficult to avoid Also bacon eggs and potato cakes were cooked in the same oven and served together Potato cakes had gluten including flours They seemed to have no idea what exactly it all means to serve safe gluten free food
30.Positive_Review: We had gluten free breakfast They had separate toaster for gluten free breads But I can not recommend the breakfast or eating there at all for people who need to follow strict gluten free diet Otherwise I can not complain great full wide ranging and diverse breakfast I just could not eat it Still for sure I could stay there for another time and bring my husband for the breakfast Enough for a big man It was great to have opportunity to print out your boarding passes after on line check in before leaving the hotel

31.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
31.Negative_Review: breakfast the same everyday not much options but good and clean fitness center has one machine and they call fitness center small rooms

32.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
32.Negative_Review: Breakfast was crowded at times and the selection of food was ok but not great
32.Positive_Review: Perfect location close to all transports Nice and clean hotel Friendly staff and a really nice garden The area was nice and quiet

33.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
33.Negative_Review: Rooms could be updated that being said everything is functional and very clean
33.Positive_Review: I absolutely love this hotel The staff is great the rooms are small but comfortable The location cannot be beat This hotel is a 2 min walk to the tube station and from there you can get anywhere you need to go

34.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
34.Negative_Review: Bed was too soft bathroom a wee bit small for manoeuvring in
34.Positive_Review: Location for tube and central London plus some nice restaurants close by too Staff were very pleasant Breakfast was fresh and plentiful choice too

35.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
35.Negative_Review: The wifi is only 500kb s which isn t fast by today s standards The power socket near the bed was loosen I can t charge my phone
35.Positive_Review: Generally it s a wonderful experience The hotel is within walking distance of Earl s court station very convenient location There re cafe bakery fast food supermarket very near to the hotel The staffs at the reception are polite and helpful especially a gentleman The room space is sufficient there s no problem to put two large suitcases The TV is new and major English TV programs are provided Mattress is comfortable it s glad to find water boiler in the room so I can make some tea Complimentary mint chocolate and drinking water are provided The cleanness is excellent no dirty spot is found Bath towels and amenities are changed everyday The surrounding area is safe to hang around during night It costs only around 100 pounds per night which is a good deal

36.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
36.Positive_Review: The breakfast was perfect very clean parking was easy to reach and available even we left the hotel one night to go to Leeds Very kind of the hotel

37.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
37.Negative_Review: We were put in a basement room which certainly wouldn t have classed as a 4 star room How ever it was clean and bed was comfortable
37.Positive_Review: The location is definitely the main selling point

38.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
38.Negative_Review: Wifi is ridiculously slow and fiddly to connect using Chrome Breakfast coffee was only average
38.Positive_Review: Good quality breakfast food friendly and efficient staff

39.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
39.Negative_Review: We choose to personally take our laundry to be cleaned as it was 1 10 th of the cost of what the hotel was going to charge this was very excessive The room was very warm but we managed by keeping the windows and drapes open
39.Positive_Review: Staff was very friendly and helpful The location was great The room was very quiet

40.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
40.Negative_Review: Not convinced that solo travellers are treated with the same consideration as others for room location in the hotel in particular
40.Positive_Review: Great Location with very easy access to public transport and popular location Major Shopping streets walkable A very comfortable hotel

41.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
41.Negative_Review: Top floor rooms were so small had to leave one suitcase in the car as unable to fit it in Rooms very hot and had to have windows open in sub zero temperatures Shower over bath tub was dangerously erratic with cold water rapidly displaced by scalding water and no non slip mat or stickers in bath Lethal combination for the elderly or children Second room key not allowed by the hotel s security so had to call reception to let us in if separated Front desk staff very dismissive
41.Positive_Review: Beds very comfortable Pleasant and necessary lounge area off reception with excellent bar staff Area good for restaurants

42.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
42.Negative_Review: The breakfast staff were not helpful When we went for breakfast the restaurant was busy and we were asked to wait about 5 minutes to be seated They forgot about us and we had to approach them about our table After 25 minutes we were finally seated I was so upset I did not have a breakfast and left the restaurant in disgust at our treatment We won t be back

43.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
43.Positive_Review: Location is excellent and easy to get into central London and choice of local restaurants fab Staff at the hotel are friendly and accommodating Rooms are spacious very comfortable and clean Breakfast options excellent and Bar area very comfortable and cosy Big plus is underground parking at the hotel also Fab experience all round

44.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
44.Negative_Review: couldn t work out how to crank DOWN the heating in the room Bathroom is miniscule Mini bar was very limited with its choice
44.Positive_Review: good sized room for the price and wonderfully located having its own bar and restaurant on site was a bonus despite there being countless foodie drinkie options outside their doors

45.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
45.Positive_Review: Excellent location near major railway lines Easy to get from the airport Friendly and helpful staff A homely atmosphere and personal attention Highly recommended

46.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
46.Negative_Review: Breakfast is expensive especially when I have already paid over 90 for a standard room per night
46.Positive_Review: Location for Central London is perfect Hotel is very clean

47.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
47.Negative_Review: mistake over payments and noise due to creaky floorbords Also It would ve been nice if we were told beforehand that a 60 euros deposit would be required regarding potential mini bar consumptions When we refused to comply the person in charge told us curtly that our mini bar shall be emptied fothwith
47.Positive_Review: very good location restaurants and supermarkets around and the clineanliness of the hotel

48.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
48.Negative_Review: The only thing I can think of is that i would have preferred not to have a wall to wall carpet in the room but it seemed clean so it was no big deal
48.Positive_Review: Superfriendly staff comfortable beds safe in the closet and the housekeeping was superb they even made the bed extra nice for my daughter by tucking in her Teddybears 3 Clean bathroom nice shower and the room was nice and quiet for my daughter to sleep in the evening Unfortunately it was winter so we did not get the opportunity to spend time in the garden but it made a nice view from the window in our room and at the breakfast table The underground is only a 2 minute walk so getting around was very easy I am overall very satisfied with my stay at this hotel and would recommend it

49.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
49.Positive_Review: I especially liked my room s well operating walk in non slip shower and bathroom an amenity not always found in other London hotels I also liked the comfortable bed the size of room the good elevators lifts and the proximity to Earl s Court Tube buses cafes shops and ATMs

50.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
50.Positive_Review: Thank you K K Hotel George at Earl s Court you assured our stay in London was fun and despite some snow cozy and pleasant Thank you for accommodating our every need from booking theatre tickets to providing cutlery for our take away even letting us borrow the HDMI cable from the business centre Everyone is so knowledgeable and helpful and kind Cannot wait try your other locations thank you again kkhotelgeorge kkhotelgeorge

51.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
51.Negative_Review: I had to ask at breakfast all 3 mornings we were there for coffee and re fills I think it would be better to have coffee on the buffet as you could just help yourself like you could with tea
51.Positive_Review: Very good location for tube station and getting around all the sights and shows we had pre booked

52.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
52.Negative_Review: My one complaint is the overly soft mattresses It was not good for my back
52.Positive_Review: Friendly helpful staff The facilities are good including the bar The Earl s Court tube station is just a few steps away and this station has access to several useful lines For what you get the prices are reasonable Very nice breakfast buffet

53.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
53.Negative_Review: The mattress wasn t comfortable and the pillows were way too soft I had a neck ache the next morning The room was super tiny We stayed at the Hilton Bankside and the room was so spacious in comparison
53.Positive_Review: The location was just 3 4 minutes from Earl s Court Paul s was also opposite the Underground station making it very convenient to pop by for breakfast excellent Espresso Cappucino and freshly baked pastries by the way before heading off for sightseeing

54.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
54.Negative_Review: Temperature in the room was difficult to regulate
54.Positive_Review: The staff are really helpful and accommodating Nothing was too much trouble The hotel is very pretty in a great location with a cosy bar area I have stayed here several times and will definitely stay again

55.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
55.Negative_Review: I don t know if it was because I booked through Booking com but seemed to get the worst room in the place Underground with no view Unable to book breakfast for second day at the reduced price as I should have done it on check in I didn t know what I was going to be doing on check in Tea and biscuits not replenished the second day

56.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
56.Negative_Review: Really nothing this was a perfect choice
56.Positive_Review: The entire staff were friendly courteous and helpful The room was clean and quiet and the breakfast was excellent as was the location 4 minute walk to the underground tube just perfect

57.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
57.Negative_Review: Rooms are not heated may be an issue in very cold winters Gym is open from 4 00 pm to 10 00pm when you usually are out
57.Positive_Review: Location heated outdoor smoking area breakfast is good Just 2 min walk to Earls Court station Halal restaurants are very close by

58.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
58.Negative_Review: Soiled chair in room Pillows not clean Shower temp control very sensitive in 1st room we stayed in Value for money

59.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
59.Positive_Review: Excellent hotel in every aspect Fantastic location with only a 2 3 minute walk to the tube station which takes you into central London Rooms are small but perfectly formed with a lovely bathroom All the staff are very polite and friendly and sorted out the small problem with the bathroom sink and brought a firmer pillow with no issues Great choice of buffet breakfast both hot and cold all replenished regularly Would definitely stay here again and recommend it to anyone

60.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
60.Negative_Review: We asked for 2 singles and a sofa bed but were given a double bed and no explanation There were few accessible plugs for hair straighteners and the like and the hair dryer didn t work To be fair we didn t take this up with the hotel so they may have sorted this if asked to do so
60.Positive_Review: Comfy bed a lovely warm room with good facilities on a cold damp London day Great shower nice toiletries and fab fluffy towels Would stay again as it was a great location The things we didn t like weren t the end of the world and we enjoyed our stay

61.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
61.Negative_Review: No Iron and ironing board and maybe a few sachets of hot chocolate in the room nothing really to complain about
61.Positive_Review: Location fantastic 2 minute walk to Earl Court tube shops and restaurants Beautiful building with parking

62.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
62.Negative_Review: Did book a twin bedded room and got a very large double so it didn t matter too much Loo very low lucky I am only 5ft 2
62.Positive_Review: Delicious English Breakfast Staff very helpful and pleasant

63.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
63.Negative_Review: Staff not particularly helpful Have stayrf before and not had room serviced so had to request this 3 times Breakfasy ok but not outstanding for a 4 Rooms small esp bathroom and not particularly warm
63.Positive_Review: Its in the right area for what we need

64.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
64.Negative_Review: Housekeeping missed my room one day and although I did not make much of a fuss over it I did not get a convincing explanation I did get an apology though
64.Positive_Review: English breakfast everyday was a welcome bonus Bar is not impressive but well run kudos to Mariusz who looked after me

65.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
65.Negative_Review: room wasn t ready was upgraded but had to pay for a drink while we waited
65.Positive_Review: overallthe hotel was worth themoney and really handy for the tube good local pub for a great breakfast

66.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
66.Positive_Review: great location near the underground 5 breakfast room size consider good when compared to London hotels super fast Wifi

67.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
67.Negative_Review: Staff could ve been a bit more clued up failed to check my booking room assigned was not what I asked for I requested a double and on entering the room was given a twin So was offered a double in the lower ground it didn t smell very pleasant in the room and the mattresses need to be changed I was advised I had been upgraded This was probably due to the error made on check in however even though the room may have been bigger there were no extras in the room and the TV was much smaller Clearly not an upgrade I don t know I guess for 135 I was expecting a lot more for a 1 night stay On checking in I was asked to pay for breakfast as its more expensive on the day yet it was already part of the rate I didn t have the best start to staying here unfortunately And not even a helping hand with my bag considering the error of assigning me the wrong room laid with the hotel breakfast could ve been more fresh and hotter Appreciate I had arrived 25mins before it closed yet it was still in the valid timeset
67.Positive_Review: location was pretty good with decent restaurants in walking distance Wifi did the job Range of tv channels Shower was lovely

68.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
68.Negative_Review: Weird atmosphere in reception many eastern European staff Room Cold and uninspiring 4 per drink of cheap orange juice mixed with tap water Overpriced overall
68.Positive_Review: Location near Earls Court Tube stop

69.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
69.Negative_Review: Front desk night manager charged my bill in dollars without permission He tried to net an extra 40 on my bill with the horrible exchange rate When I caught it he told me I must have authorized it at check in which I had not Completely unacceptable

70.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
70.Negative_Review: The towel in the bathroom had blood on it and it wasn t our blood so disgusting Also we had a room below the pavement at the front of the hotel with a lot of noise from foot traffic and their conversations
70.Positive_Review: Staff on the front desk we re very welcoming

71.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
71.Negative_Review: The gym facility is pointless make sure you go elsewhere if you want to use the gym
71.Positive_Review: Very short walk from the tube but not on the main road ideal location

72.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
72.Negative_Review: Two years in a row we checked in for 10 days On booking we were asked about early arrival and we noted we would arrive before the 3pm check in time No effort was made to shorten or minimize hours of waiting time to get our room Last year our friends from the Midlands arrived for a 1 night stay while we were there and at 9am sharp their room was ready and they got in Let me see ten days and thousands of pound versus one night Who do you take care of

73.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
73.Negative_Review: Saw into the cleaner maids cupboard due to a door not fully shut during hours when servicing of rooms was not happening
73.Positive_Review: Wonderful bed Impeccably clean room Staff are very helpful and polite

74.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
74.Negative_Review: The air condition did not work for cooling down the room we were told to shut it off and open the windows which brought all sounds from streets in from police etc Our room on the 5th floor was small and the bathroom was very small about 3 m2
74.Positive_Review: Comfortable beds quality breakfast nice and helpful staff short walk to the tube

75.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
75.Negative_Review: The bathroom is too small and the break fast lacks variety for one staying more than four days I stayed for 6 nights The cleaners don t replenish toiletry supplies facial tissues ran out from my rom and they didn t refinish them They also don t replace bed covers if you don t ask them
75.Positive_Review: The location the room was a little bigger for the usual London hotel room The staff are generally very friendly from the front desk to the kitchen huge asset for the hotel They provide umbrellas when it rains and of course the wifi fantastic I enjoyed my stay overall

76.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
76.Negative_Review: It was noisy throughout the night because of the central heating boiler being so close to room 116 If it wasn t the boiler it was something else noisy

77.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
77.Negative_Review: The heating was not working in the room for the first two days
77.Positive_Review: Very well kept hotel with a lovely garden Staff particularly friendly and professional A very nice room

78.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
78.Negative_Review: I think this may be a London thing judging from other reviews but the rooms and corridors are tiny think small and take away another foot In our room the window didn t close properly the heat didn t work and the bath did not empty when you took a shower Very dated apart from the TV If like us you intend not to be in your room much the hotel is adequate but would I stay again not if it was free is the answer
78.Positive_Review: The Location was good on a quiet street about 200 meters from the Earls court Tube and buses Close to some nice restaurants and pubs for breakfast lunch or dinner

79.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
79.Negative_Review: Noise from other rooms eg talking late at night airless corridors smelled a bit institutional
79.Positive_Review: Very comfortable beds well lit room bathroom compact but worked well the staff were all polite and helpful good gardens and quiet location

80.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
80.Negative_Review: The room facing the street sometimes there s some noise from people chat but it became silence after midnight
80.Positive_Review: The staff are friendly and kindly to help Our room is not in the basement and it s clean especially the bathroom which we care most Briefly it s a good hotel in this price we ll choose to stay again next time

81.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
81.Negative_Review: I can t think of a thing that needed improved upon All aspects of my stay were excellent
81.Positive_Review: Stayed in room 226 Comfy bed and pillows Quiet room facing lovely garden Super clean and neat Good size flat screen TV with lots of channels Staff wonderfully helpful Food in bar restaurant really good and priced on par with other sit down table service restaurants Two minute walk from Earl s Court Tube Also every convenience a traveler could want located right on Earl s Court Road several bank ATMs pubs and other eateries laundry dry cleaning services even America fast food if you need your fix McDonald s Burger King KFC and Starbucks There s even a retractable clothes line in the shower for those travelers like me who do a bit of sink laundry I always remind my fellow Americans who are not used to European hotel rooms that rooms are small compared to US standards but comfort cleanliness and location rank FAR higher in my opinion than wasted floor space

82.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
82.Negative_Review: Definitely not a 4 star hotel Triple room was super tiny not even a double room size we were really struggling Not enough wardrobe space not enough plugs in the room third bed very umcomfortable Facilities very basic toileteries including only shampoo and shower gel very bad quality not even shower cap or body lotion Except for the reception ladies staff very rude Definitely not reccomended Being in London in the same area several times and there are definitely better real 4 stars
82.Positive_Review: The position of the hotel was very close to Earl s Court Tube Station

83.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
83.Positive_Review: The location was perfect Stones through away from Earls Court station Staff were all lovely and accommodating Gardens were lovely Cracking Thai restaurant round the corner too Rooms were fine nothing outstanding but clean and the bed was comfy We didn t use all the hotel facilities unfortunately as really busy sight seeing

84.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
84.Negative_Review: Cleaning of the hotel is a bit slow room does not get cleaned until 5pm For people who like to take some rest in the hotel during the day seems to be inconvenient
84.Positive_Review: Very convenient location to transfer and restaurants and even the rooms are on ground floor it is on a quiet street and we are able to a good night rest

85.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
85.Negative_Review: Very small room dated interior The cleaning could improve My room floor had an angle from one side of the wall towards the bed The bed was loosing boards underneath it
85.Positive_Review: The staff was helpful and friendly The lobby bar and breakfast areas are pleasant It is conveniently located close to the center without being in a noisy road Very close proximity to fast food chains supermarket and the metro

86.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
86.Negative_Review: Maybe bathroom door could open out vs in as it s a very tight space and this would help
86.Positive_Review: Bed linen is so cozy lovely breakfast super showers and staff are great and friendly

87.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
87.Negative_Review: There is no proper air conditioning it s set to heating in October so the room can get too hot to have a comfortable temperature to sleep Air con at this time of the year is opening the windows

88.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
88.Positive_Review: The location was perfect close to the Underground restaurants etc yet quiet The food both breakfast and lunch was delicious fresh flavorful The staff throughout from front desk to housekeeping to restaurant were delightful The room was spotless bed was heavenly view from the room was a beautiful garden Perfect conclusion to our 3 week stay in the UK

89.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
89.Positive_Review: This is the second K K hotel I stayed at the other was in Barcelona It s a great boutique hotel The hotels are spotless staff is extremely friendly and this particular hotel has the most gorgeous back yard although it was a little too cold to sit outside You re in a good neighborhood not in the thick of it all which is nice for London Would definitely stay here again

90.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
90.Negative_Review: There was nothing that we can think of The room key is very large and there is only one They ask that you turn it in when you go out It s a little eccentric but OK
90.Positive_Review: It was small but comfortable and very quiet The garden was beautiful Breakfast was very good Staff was friendly and helpful It is located only two blocks from the tube

91.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
91.Negative_Review: there where waterpipes near the room it sounded like it s in our own toilet everytime someone upstairs flushed very loud and sbsolutely disturbing maybe only in these room 12

92.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
92.Negative_Review: The room was really really cold The heating didn t work I was brought an electric heater but the room was too cold for it to make any difference This led to a really bad nights sleep

93.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
93.Positive_Review: K k is a heath hotel that can a person stay on I like it a lot I get a beautiful welcome I think to come next year with my family And thank you for all

94.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
94.Negative_Review: Thankfully upgraded to a superior room and even that was small and noisy No scrambled eggs at breakfast first morning second morning they ran out of eggs Should be constantly monitored This is a deceptively large and busy hotel I requested somewhere within close walking distance to Olympia 25 min walk is not that close
94.Positive_Review: Staff Great friendly Acomodating In particular reception staff and bar man Wednesday night You can open a bedroom window

95.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
95.Negative_Review: The bed mattress was too hard without the mattress topper on which we removed because it made us hot The mattress was orthopaedic firm

96.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
96.Negative_Review: Breakfast is good but has some potential for improvements Long periods without eggs etc Very limited selection of vegetables and salad Would probably expect better breakfast from a 4 star place
96.Positive_Review: Very good location in a quiet street with no bars or noisy passer bys Only a short walk to nearest subway Nice and clean hotel but with relatively small rooms Good service but could benefit from a bit more warmth from he staff Nice breakfast restaurant Will come back again

97.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
97.Negative_Review: Don t believe there was anything we didn t like My personal choice for marmalade at breakfast wasn t available but I was able to find something else amongst the spread choices to satisfy my palate so this isn t a complaint
97.Positive_Review: The hotel is incredibly handy to Earl s Court Station We loved using the garden at the rear of the hotel plus its quiet location such a bonus for enjoying a quiet G T at the end of each hectic day in London We ate breakfast daily throughout our stay in the hotel s restaurant and the freshness food quality and choices were excellent Being exhausted one night we ate dinner also in the restaurant where we chose from a limited but ample menu Must mention that we had initial fears of noise from the elevator adjacent to which our room was located There was no need to worry as we never heard a sound from it amazing We ll be using this hotel again as it suited us so well

98.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
98.Negative_Review: Personally I think the bathroom needs a door to keep water away from the toilet and it will save the clerk a lot of cleaning work by putting a plastic bag in the rubbish bin
98.Positive_Review: Excellent location You have the access to Earl s Court Underground within 3 minutes walk District and Piccadilly Lines take you to most of the sites you possibly need to go especially Heathrow without any transfer Many stores and restaurants around but the hotel is situated in a quiet quarter

99.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
99.Negative_Review: Just walking in the reception could be made a bit more comfortable perhaps seating for more than 1 person a table for brochures Also we found that the area had many good local restaurants which could be printed on a simple map as well as grocery stores hairdresser etc These were in walking distance to the hotel and would be a great help for first time visitors
99.Positive_Review: House keeping quality and service very good Even folded our clothes Breakfast was unbelievable You even had stewed prunes First floor room was clean comfortable and very quiet Loved the morning newspapers and availability of little lounge for afterdinner coffee and drinks Liked the breakfast being made available with room price Obtaining a cab at desk was very quick and their services the cab was quality also Would consider staying here again

100.Hotel_Address: 1 15 Templeton Place Earl s Court Kensington and Chelsea London SW5 9NB United Kingdom
100.Positive_Review: Although the rooms are small they are comfortable and cozy and we found the hotel to be a great spot to rest and relax after running around the city Breakfast was included making the price a little more reasonable than many hotels in this very expensive city
